sense.def:
Izraz
whoever
se nanaša na osebo, ki nekaj stori, kadar njena identiteta ni pomembna ali poznana.

seg.quote: If death occurs at home, whoever discovers the body should contact the family doctor.
Whoever answered the telephone was a very charming woman.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
whoever
tudi povemo, da prava identiteta osebe, ki nekaj stori, ne bo vplivala na položaj ali okoliščine.

seg.quote: Whoever wins the war, there will be little peace.
Whoever you vote for, prices will go on rising.

sense.def:
Izraz
whoever
uporabljamo tudi v vprašanjih kot poudarjeno obliko za
who
.

seg.quote: Whoever could that be at this time of night?
